item.title: ExpertPlan
item.p: Through ExpertPlan, LTSave offers an R share, A share, and RIA product. Each product has a superset of funds selected by LTSave from a list of appropriate funds. LTSave defines six models using these funds for managed accounts.

ul.li:

User accounts, www.expertplan.com:
mybrokerdemo/mybrokerdemo, ExpertPlan demo broker account for "street site", includes LTSave products.
mydemo/2002demo, ExpertPlan demo participant account, not LTSave
ltsavebroker/password, test broker account with all LTSave products.
ltsave1/password, administrator for the ltsave test account. Includes Plan Sponsor access.
ltsave2,ltsave3, ltsave4,.../password, test users with some payroll money.

User accounts on test system, 216.203.8.91:
Same as expertplan.com, except that password is 'testme'.

Web services:
ltsavewebservice on ExpertPlan test -- programmatic access to ExpertPlan. For interface see
